# Aulas Analyzer Project

## Overview
React application for analyzing classroom (aulas) availability from Excel/CSV scheduling data.

## Tech Stack
- Vite + React
- Tailwind CSS
- xlsx library for Excel parsing
- papaparse for CSV parsing
- lucide-react for icons

## Development
- Use `npm run dev` to start development server
- Use `npm run build` to build for production
- Use `npm run preview` to preview production build

## Deployment
- Configured for GitHub Pages
- Build outputs to `dist/` folder
- Base path configured for repository name
